Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2009 09:45PM Elizabeth963 wrote: Hi Barbgale, I know it's hard not to worry..I'm in the same boat with you - clustering microcalcs, pleomorphic..had my biopsy Tuesday and I'm waiting for results.  I'm glad your Mom has been okay..I guess that's what we can hope for - B9 results or something noninvasive or the inbetween which means more surgery I guess.  It's hard to be in the unknown, I don't like it either.  But soon we will know and we will either celebrate together or march forward with our head up.  Keep breathing, Elizabeth
Posts.Title: Pleomorphic Calcifications mommyalways Isellrejer

Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2009 10:38PM Elizabeth963 wrote: I've slept better these last two days than I have in a month.  (and during that month had to take ambien just to go to sleep).  My anxiety symptoms (shortness of breath mostly) have also gone away.  My heart and hugs go out to those waiting for results and all others who've gotten difficult news.    Thanks for my well wishes too.  XO
